comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Fascination Nostalgia, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Invitation / Invitación / Einladung / Invito / Convite / Uitnodiging / Приглашение /招待 The photo is beautiful www.flickr.com/groups/fascination_nostalgia/
